akn:section.akn:heading: Limitations on substitution of unprocessed Federal timber for unprocessed timber exported from priva

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Domestic transportation and processing of private timber

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Domestic transportation and processing of private timber Nothing in this section restricts or authorizes any restriction on the domestic transportation or processing of timber harvested from private land, except that the Secretary may prohibit processing facilities located in the State of Idaho that have sourcing areas from processing timber harvested from private land outside of the boundaries of those sourcing areas.
